com.soen6471.vaxsys.dao

Interface PatientSlotMappingDao

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<PatientSlotMapping,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<PatientSlotMapping,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<PatientSlotMapping,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<PatientSlotMapping>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<PatientSlotMapping,java.lang.Integer>

    @Repository
public interface PatientSlotMappingDao
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<PatientSlotMapping,java.lang.Integer>
    This is Repository class for PatientSlotMapping table. It is used to manage all database relate transaction for this table. This facility is used by various services.

    • Method Detail

      • getSlotByPId

        @Query(value="SELECT new com.soen6471.vaxsys.dto.SlotDetailDto (p.ID , p.patientId,s.ID,s.time,vs.ID,vs.location,v.name,p.vacDate) FROM PatientSlotMapping p JOIN Slot s ON s.ID = p.slotID JOIN VaccineSupplier vs ON vs.ID = p.vaccineSupplierId JOIN Vaccine v ON v.ID = vs.vaccineID WHERE p.patientId = :patientId AND p.status = 1 AND p.vacDate >= current_date")
java.util.List<SlotDetailDto> getSlotByPId(@Param(value="patientId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.Integer patientId)
        This is used to view all teh upcoming appointments
        Parameters:
        patientId - patient ID
        Returns:
        list of the upcoming slot registration

      • updateStatus

        @Modifying
 @Query(value="UPDATE PatientSlotMapping p SET p.status = 0 WHERE  p.ID = :slotId")
java.lang.Integer updateStatus(java.lang.Integer slotId)
        This is used to update status to inactive for canceleed slots
        Parameters:
        slotId - Id of the slots
        Returns:
        status of cancellation process

      • getSlots

        @Query(value="SELECT new com.soen6471.vaxsys.model.Slot (s.ID,s.time)    FROM PatientSlotMapping p   JOIN Slot s ON s.ID = p.slotID    WHERE p.status = :status AND p.patientId = :patientId     AND p.vaccineSupplierId = :hospitalId AND p.vacDate >= :selectedDate")
java.util.List<Slot> getSlots(@Param(value="selectedDate")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       java.util.Date selectedDate,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @Param(value="patientId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.Integer patientId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @Param(value="hospitalId")

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @Param(value="status")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       int status)
        This is used to get all the remained /unbooked slots
        Parameters:
        selectedDate - Date for which user is looking for the appointment
        patientId - Id of the patient
        hospitalId - Hospital Id selected for booking slot
        status - This is used to get active slots
        Returns:
        list of booked slots
